name: hlcph

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cbn))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ CHil, c0 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ Ban)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccph))
-| wb(wcel(c0, chl), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHil ↔(c0 ∈ Ban ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccph))
-| wb(wcel(c0, chl), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHil ↔(c0 ∈ Ban ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, chl), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))

comment: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
